section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content:

If you are under 18, you must have parental or guardian consent to use the Service.

To access certain features of the Service, you must create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and to update such information to keep it accurate and complete.

We are not responsible for the accuracy of handicap calculations, scoring, or any disputes arising from competition results. Competition organizers are responsible for ensuring fair play among participants.

section9.title: 9. Contact
section9.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@rydercupfriends.com or through our Contact page.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content:
We collect information you provide directly when creating an account and using the Service:

- Account information: name, email address, country, gender (optional)
- Golf profile: handicap index, tee category preferences
- Competition data: scores, match results, team assignments
- Device information: browser type, device fingerprint (for security)

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.content:
We use collected information to:

- Provide and maintain the Service
- Manage your account and competitions
- Calculate handicaps and generate match pairings
- Send important notifications about your competitions
- Improve the Service and develop new features
- Ensure security and prevent abuse

section3.title: 3. Cookies and Local Storage
section3.content:
We use the following storage mechanisms:

- httpOnly cookies: Authentication tokens (access and refresh tokens) stored securely and not accessible via JavaScript
- localStorage: Language preference (i18next), UI settings
- Session cookies: CSRF protection tokens

We do not use third-party advertising cookies or tracking cookies.

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Services
section4.content:
We use the following third-party services:

- Sentry: Error tracking and performance monitoring. Collects anonymized error data and session replays to help us fix bugs.
- Cloudflare: CDN and security. Processes requests to protect against malicious traffic.
- Render: Hosting platform for the application.

These services have their own privacy policies governing their use of data.

section5.title: 5. Data Retention
section5.content:
We retain your data for as long as your account is active. If you delete your account, we will remove your personal data within 30 days, except where retention is required by law.

Competition results may be retained in anonymized form for statistical purposes.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.content:
You have the right to:

- Access your personal data through your profile
- Update or correct your information
- Delete your account and associated data
- Export your competition data
- Object to certain processing of your data

To exercise these rights, contact us at support@rydercupfriends.com.

section7.title: 7. Children's Privacy
section7.content: The Service is not directed to children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If you believe we have inadvertently collected such information, please contact us immediately.

section8.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
section8.content:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the updated policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

Your continued use of the Service after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

section9.title: 9. Contact
section9.content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@rydercupfriends.com or through our Contact page.

section1.title: 1. What Are Cookies
section1.content:
Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and to provide information to site owners.

We also use similar technologies such as localStorage for storing preferences.

section2.title: 2. Cookies We Use
section2.content:
Essential cookies (required for the Service to function):

- Authentication cookies (httpOnly): Secure access and refresh tokens that keep you logged in. These cannot be accessed by JavaScript, protecting against XSS attacks.
- CSRF token cookie: Protects against cross-site request forgery attacks.

Functional storage (localStorage):

- Language preference: Remembers your selected language (English/Spanish).
- UI preferences: Theme and display settings.
- Session flags: Lazy loading error recovery.

section3.title: 3. Managing Cookies
section3.content:
You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling essential cookies will prevent you from logging in and using authenticated features of the Service.

To clear authentication cookies, use the "Logout" button in the application, which will properly invalidate your session.

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
section4.content:
We do not use third-party advertising or tracking cookies.

Our third-party services (Sentry for error tracking, Cloudflare for security) may set their own cookies for functionality purposes. These are governed by their respective privacy policies.

section5.title: 5. Contact
section5.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at support@rydercupfriends.com or through our Contact page.
